definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Conclusion GKC is effective in treating chronic bronchitis in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 結論固本咳喘膠囊治療老年慢性支氣管炎療效確切。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Qingfeifang in treating cough.
sentences.chinese: 觀察清肺定哮方加減治療嬰幼兒毛細支氣管炎的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Injectio Salviae Miltiorrhizae Composita, as add-on treatment of bronchiolitis of newborn, has a good efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 結論複方丹蔘輔佐治療新生兒毛細支氣管炎療效明顯。

sentences.english: You may develop complications of the flu, such as bronchitis or pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 流感併發症可能還會變成加重成支氣管炎或肺炎。

sentences.english: To explore an effective therapy for treating bronchiolitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討治療毛細支氣管炎的有效方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Xiyanping injection treatments capillary bronchitis has good effect.
sentences.chinese: 結論喜炎平注射液治療毛細支氣管炎有較好的療效。

sentences.english: The most common complications of flu are bronchitis and secondary bacterial pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的流感併發症有支氣管炎和繼發性細菌性肺炎。

sentences.english: Effects can vary from slight irritation to bronchitis or pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 影響小則輕微刺激，大至支氣管炎或肺炎。

sentences.english: He was in bed with bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 他患支氣管炎臥病在牀。

sentences.english: To the cold, whooping cough, laryngitis , chronic bronchitic effective.
sentences.chinese: 對感冒，百日咳，喉炎，慢性支氣管炎有效。

sentences.english: With viral bronchitis, small amounts of white mucus are often coughed up.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性急性支氣管炎，通常咳出少量白色粘液痰。

sentences.english: Acute bronchitis is more likely to be caused by bacteria in people who smoke.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸的人更容易發生細菌感染性支氣管炎。

sentences.english: Children with enlarged tonsils and adenoids may have repeated episodes of bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃腺腫大的兒童可能反覆急性支氣管炎發作。

sentences.english: She often gets chesty in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 在潮溼天氣，她經常犯支氣管炎。

sentences.english: Promoting blood circulation and detoxication method can increase the comprehensive curative effect in treating chronic bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 活血解毒法治療慢性支氣管炎可明顯提高其綜合療效。

sentences.english: People with acute bronchitis, especially those who have a fever, should drink plenty of fluid.
sentences.chinese: 急性支氣管炎患者，特別有發燒時，需要大量飲水。

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
